00591 inline LangTypes::language_t
00592 GenericMapHeader::getNativeLanguage(uint32 i) const
00593 {
00594    if (i < getNbrNativeLanguages())

00596    else

00601 GenericMapHeader::getNbrCurrencies() const
00602 {

00605    else

00607 
00608 }

00610 inline StringTable::stringCode 
00611 GenericMapHeader::getCurrency(uint32 i) const
00612 {
00613    if (i < getNbrCurrencies())
00614       return (StringTable::stringCode(m_currency->getElementAt(i)));
00615    else
00616       return (StringTable::NOSTRING);
00617 
00618 }
